Compose a Crank Predict Type for Survival Learners

Source: R/crankcompositor.R
crankcompositor.Rd

This is a wrapper around the PipeOpCrankCompositor pipe operation, which simplifies graph creation.

crankcompositor(
  learner,
  method = c("mean", "median", "mode"),
  param_vals = list()
)

Arguments

learner

LearnerSurv object for which a crank is composed (or over-written)
method

One of mean, mode, or median; abbreviations allowed. Used to determine how crank is estimated from the predicted distr. Default is mean.
param_vals

Additional parameters to pass to the learner.

Value

mlr3pipelines::GraphLearner

Details

For full details see PipeOpCrankCompositor.

Examples

library(mlr3)
library(mlr3pipelines)

task = tgen("simsurv")$generate(20)
ranger.crank = crankcompositor(learner = lrn("surv.coxph"),
                            method = "median")
resample(task, ranger.crank, rsmp("cv", folds = 2))$predictions()
#> [[1]]
